remarks: Convert an operation associative law to class notation.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
statement:
caovass.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
caovass.2 $e |- B e. _V $.

caovass.4 $e |- ( ( x F y ) F z ) = ( x F ( y F z ) ) $.
caovass $p |- ( ( A F B ) F C ) = ( A F ( B F C ) ) $.
